name: Foot Massage
description:
The player plays the role of a foot masseuse. Every night to receive city beauties, provide foot massage services. Serve people and meet own little hobbies.
· Include a variety of massage techniques, restore the real massage experience.
· The game characters have unique AI, with human-like feedback to the player's touch.
· Detailed and realistic female characters in the game.
· Rich clothes, can royal sister, can girl, elegant and sexy.
· In short, if you like beautiful feet, this is a game not to be missed.
